_sText:
With this mod, weapons in CSS will have real names (in buy menu and hud, as you can see in screenshots) instead of fake ones!
eg.
Night Hawk --> Desert Eagle
CV-47 --> AK-47

Installation:
Put cstrike_english.txt from resource folder to: "cstrike/resource" (replace if it asks you) or put resource folder in: "cstrike/custom/"your folder""
